settings.title: Discover The Most In-Demand Styles You'll Only Find Here

settings.html_area: #ElieTahari

settings.title: WHAT’S THE CATCH? IS THERE AN ADDITIONAL FEE?
settings.answer: No! There is absolutely no catch! Our in house styling is completely free to you! All you pay for are the clothes you want to keep! You only pay for shipping if you are returning ALL items.

settings.title: WHAT IF I DON’T RETURN WITH THE 3-DAY TRY ON PERIOD?
settings.answer: If you don’t return the clothing within the 3 day try on period and have not informed your stylist that it will be late for any reason then you will be charged for those particular items. If the clothing is destroyed or the tag has been taken off you will be charged for that item.

settings.title: DO I HAVE TO PAY FOR THE RETURN SHIPPING?
settings.answer: No! Returning the items you don’t want are completely free! We will send you the return label and you send back what you don’t want on us!

settings.title: CAN I CHOOSE ANYTHING FROM THE WEBSITE?
settings.answer: Since Signature Style is an in-house styling program only new arrivals and items that haven’t been marked 50% off are available to you. Our lookbooks will only include styles that are new or in season. We don’t want to send you the old stuff!

settings.title: IS THERE A CLOTHING LIMIT?
settings.answer: $2,000 Maximum that can be sent out at one time to a client that has been shopping with us less than 6 months. $10,000 Maximum that can be sent out at one time to a client that has been shopping with us for more than 6 months. Product up to 50% off is not eligible for Signature Style.

settings.title: IS SIGNATURE STYLE AVAILABLE FOR EVERYBODY?
settings.answer: Yes! It is available to anyone! If you are an Elie Tahari fan or are new to our brand you are welcome to join our signature style program!

settings.title: HOW DO I LEARN MORE ABOUT ELIE TAHARI’S NEW STYLES?
settings.answer: For more information you can reach out to one of our personal stylists through our live chat service, email them at  signaturestyle@elietahari.com or call them at 973.671.6419. We are also always posting our newest styles exclusively on our website in our What’s New Category and on our social media channels @elietahari

settings.title: HOW DO I KNOW MY SIZE?
settings.answer: Your personal in-house stylist will be able to help you determine what size is best for your body type. All you have to do is tell them your measurements and they will provide you with the best sizing choice.

settings.html:
Discover High Summer' 25

Summer, amplified. Define by bold prints, sunlit embroidery, and metal-kissed details, our High Summer' 25 collection arrives confidently. Crafted in crisp cottons, refined jerseys, and lightweight knits, each piece is a study in sophisticated ease. This is a wardrobe built for the woman who commands attention without asking for it - who knows that true style doesn't chase seasons, it sets the tone. Modern, Sensual, Unmistakably powerful. Summer, as only Elie Tahari envisions it.

Shop New Arrivals
